modName: Enable Kill Moves Only For Player
summary: This script sets KillMove to 0 at all times except for when the player is swinging a weapon.  This means that, effectively, only the player may make cinematic kill moves.
descriptionHtml:
-Description-
This script sets KillMove to 0 at all times except for when the player is swinging a weapon or bashing with a shield.  This means that, effectively, only the player may make cinematic kill moves.

Keep in mind that you may still, rarely, be hit by a kill move if you are in the middle of an attack (swinging your weapon or having an arrow notched in your bow).

-Requirements-
Requires Script Dragon, found here: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other

-Installation-
1. Install Script Dragon from the above link.
2. Place killmovesAttack.asi into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. Not the Data folder.

-Uninstalling-
Delete killmovesAttack.asi.

-Credit-
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon.
author: Eldiran

files.name: Kill Moves Only for Player - Sneaking
